author: rwesten
msg: Resolves STANBOL-161: Referenced Sites now provide the additional metadata. They are also available via the RESTful API
STANBOL-162: The Referenced Site now currently detects Offline mode. If OfflineMode is active the content is only enhanced when the ReferencedSite also supports OfflineMode.
- /site/{siteId}/ now returns the metadata of the referenced site

- if an license is not available by an URL (license.getUrl() == null) than the license is accessible via /site/{siteID}/license/{licenseName}. The URL for the license is returned as part of the metadata for the referenced site
- Metadata are returned as Representation. because of this a Writer for Representations where added.
- When OfflineMode is activated, this engine now checks within the enhace(..) method if the used ReferencedSite can work in OfflineMode.
- now the License class is used instead of multiple methods for name,text and url. This allows better support for sites that use dual licenses (such as DBPedia)
- added License information for the DBpedia referenced Site

author: rhuijben
msg: Remove an unused md5_checksum from the commit processing. Also make a
few deprecated functions retrieve the sha1 for their md5, where they
used to pass NULL. This connects them to existing pristines wh
This commit has no functional changes on the non-deprecated functions,
and should fix some usages of the deprecated ones.
(svn_client_commit5): Don't store md5 checksums. Update caller.
(svn_wc_queue_committed3): Don't set md5 checksum in baton
(svn_wc_queue_committed2): Get sha1 checksum if an MD5 checksum was provided.

author: cziegeler
msg: SLING-2052 : Launchpad installer does not support nested structure
